Detailed Description

Implements SessionConfigI, reads the configuration from an XML config file

void org::ipdr::collector::configuration::SessionConfigXml::fillTemplatesData (   )  throws DataConversionException, ConfigException [inline, private]
 

Fills templates from <Templates>, looking them up in the global template list

Exceptions:
DataConversionException 
ConfigException 
00072     {
00073         // get list of config templates
00074         CollectorConfigXml config = (CollectorConfigXml) (this.connection.getCollectorConfig());
00075         java.util.List templates = this.templates.getChildren("TemplateRef");
00076         for (int i = 0; i < templates.size(); i++)
00077         {
00078             Element templateElt = (Element) templates.get(i);
00079             int ref = templateElt.getAttribute("ref").getIntValue();
00080             // fint template with id = ref in configTemplates
00081             TemplateConfig template = null;
00082             try
00083             {
00084                 template = (TemplateConfig) config.findTemplate(ref).clone();
00085             }
00086             catch (CloneNotSupportedException e)
00087             {
00088             }
00089             // find template negotiation mask - if exists 
00090             if (template == null)
00091                 throw new ConfigException("Invalid template reference");
00092             Element templateConfiguration = templateElt.getChild("TemplateConfig");
00093             if (templateConfiguration != null)
00094             {
00095                 // apply the unique session fields setup to the template clone
00096                 List fieldSetup = templateConfiguration.getChildren("FieldConfig");
00097                 Iterator itFieldSetup = fieldSetup.iterator();
00098                 while(itFieldSetup.hasNext())
00099                 {
00100                     Element fieldSetupElt = (Element)itFieldSetup.next();
00101                     int fieldId = XMLUtility.getMandatoryIntAttribute(fieldSetupElt, "keyId");
00102                     boolean fieldState = XMLUtility.getMandatoryBooleanAttribute(fieldSetupElt, "fieldUsed");
00103                     FieldConfigI fieldConfig = template.getFieldById(fieldId);
00104                     fieldConfig.setEnabledForOutput(fieldState);
00105                 }
00106             }   
00107             this.sessionTemplatesList.add(template);
00108         }
00109     }
